name: SelectItem
description:
An individual option in the select popup.
Renders a `<div>` element.

label.description:
Specifies the text label to use when the item is matched during keyboard text navigation.

Defaults to the item text content if not provided.

value.description: A unique value that identifies this select item.

nativeButton.description:
Whether the component renders a native `<button>` element when replacing it
via the `render` prop.
Set to `true` if the rendered element is a native button.

disabled.description: Whether the component should ignore user interaction.

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.
render.detailedType:
| ReactElement
| ((
    props: HTMLProps,
    state: Select.Item.State,
  ) => ReactElement)

data-selected.description: Present when the select item is selected.

data-highlighted.description: Present when the select item is highlighted.

data-disabled.description: Present when the select item is disabled.
